Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.apache.avro.data.Json.Reader
    use Json.ObjectReader
    org.apache.avro.data.Json.Writer
    use Json.ObjectWriter
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.apache.avro.JsonProperties.addProp(String, JsonNode)
    use JsonProperties.addProp(String, Object)
    org.apache.avro.io.JsonEncoder.configure(JsonGenerator)
    internal method
    org.apache.avro.io.DecoderFactory.createBinaryDecoder(byte[], BinaryDecoder)
    use DecoderFactory.binaryDecoder(byte[], BinaryDecoder) instead
    org.apache.avro.io.DecoderFactory.createBinaryDecoder(byte[], int, int, BinaryDecoder)
    use DecoderFactory.binaryDecoder(byte[], int, int, BinaryDecoder) instead
    org.apache.avro.io.DecoderFactory.createBinaryDecoder(InputStream, BinaryDecoder)
    use the equivalent DecoderFactory.binaryDecoder(InputStream, BinaryDecoder) instead
    org.apache.avro.generic.GenericDatumReader.createFixed(Object, byte[], Schema)
    As of Avro 1.6.0 this method has been moved to GenericData.createFixed(Object, byte[], Schema)
    org.apache.avro.generic.GenericDatumReader.createFixed(Object, Schema)
    As of Avro 1.6.0 this method has been moved to GenericData.createFixed(Object, Schema)
    org.apache.avro.Protocol.createMessage(String, String, Schema)
    org.apache.avro.Protocol.createMessage(String, String, Schema, Schema, Schema)
    org.apache.avro.io.DecoderFactory.defaultFactory()
    use the equivalent DecoderFactory.get() instead
    org.apache.avro.Schema.Field.defaultValue()
    use Schema.Field.defaultVal()
    org.apache.avro.io.parsing.ResolvingGrammarGenerator.encode(Encoder, Schema, JsonNode)
    internal method
    org.apache.avro.specific.SpecificRecordBase.getConverion(String)
    As of Avro 1.8.2, this method has been moved to SpecificRecordBase.getConversion(String) method from 1.9.0.
    org.apache.avro.JsonProperties.getJsonProp(String)
    use JsonProperties.getObjectProp(String)
    org.apache.avro.JsonProperties.getJsonProps()
    use JsonProperties.getObjectProps()
    org.apache.avro.util.Utf8.getLength()
    call Utf8.getByteLength() instead.
    org.apache.avro.JsonProperties.getProps()
    org.apache.avro.io.EncoderFactory.jsonEncoder(Schema, JsonGenerator)
    internal method
    org.apache.avro.generic.GenericDatumReader.newRecord(Object, Schema)
    As of Avro 1.6.0 this method has been moved to GenericData.newRecord(Object, Schema)
    org.apache.avro.Schema.parse(File)
    use Schema.Parser instead.
    org.apache.avro.Schema.parse(InputStream)
    use Schema.Parser instead.
    org.apache.avro.Schema.parse(String)
    use Schema.Parser instead.
    org.apache.avro.Schema.parse(String, boolean)
    use Schema.Parser instead.
    org.apache.avro.Schema.parseJson(String)
    use Json.parseJson(String)
    org.apache.avro.Schema.Field.props()
    org.apache.avro.data.Json.read(Decoder)
    internal method
    org.apache.avro.util.Utf8.setLength(int)
    call Utf8.setByteLength(int) instead.
    org.apache.avro.data.Json.write(JsonNode, Encoder)
    internal method
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.apache.avro.Schema.Field(String, Schema, String, JsonNode)
    use #Field(String, Schema, String, Object)
    org.apache.avro.Schema.Field(String, Schema, String, JsonNode, Schema.Field.Order)
    use #Field(String, Schema, String, Object, Order)
    org.apache.avro.io.parsing.Symbol.DefaultStartAction(byte[])
    org.apache.avro.io.parsing.Symbol.EnumAdjustAction(int, Object[])
    org.apache.avro.io.parsing.Symbol.EnumLabelsAction(List)
    org.apache.avro.io.parsing.Symbol.FieldAdjustAction(int, String)
    org.apache.avro.io.parsing.Symbol.FieldOrderAction(Schema.Field[])

    org.apache.avro.io.parsing.Symbol.SkipAction(Symbol)
    org.apache.avro.io.parsing.Symbol.UnionAdjustAction(int, Symbol)
